Settings.QueryText:
SELECT DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.Ref, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.Date, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.DeletionMark, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.Number, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.Posted, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.Entity, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.CashType, CASE WHEN DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.CashType = VALUE(Enum.CashAssetTypes.Cash) THEN DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.PettyCash ELSE UNDEFINED END AS PettyCash, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.Article, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.Counterparty, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.AmountReceipt, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.AmountExpense, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.Currency, CAST(DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.Comment AS STRING(255)) AS Comment, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.Author, CASE WHEN DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.CashType = VALUE(Enum.CashAssetTypes.Noncash) THEN DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.BankAccount ELSE UNDEFINED END AS BankAccount, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.Type, SUM(AmountPerDay.AmountReceipt) AS AmountOfReceiptForDay, SUM(AmountPerDay.AmountExpense) AS ExpenseAmountPerDay FROM DocumentJournal.FundsPlanningDocuments AS DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar LEFT JOIN DocumentJournal.FundsPlanningDocuments AS AmountPerDay ON (BEGINOFPERIOD(DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.Date, Day) = BEGINOFPERIOD(AmountPerDay.Date, Day)) AND DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.Currency = AmountPerDay.Currency AND (AmountPerDay.Posted)
GROUP BY DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.Ref, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.Date, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.DeletionMark, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.Number, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.Posted, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.Entity, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.CashType, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.Article, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.Counterparty, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.AmountReceipt, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.AmountExpense, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.Currency, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.Author, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.Type, CASE WHEN DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.CashType = VALUE(Enum.CashAssetTypes.Cash) THEN DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.PettyCash ELSE UNDEFINED END, CAST(DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.Comment AS STRING(255)), CASE WHEN DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.CashType = VALUE(Enum.CashAssetTypes.Noncash) THEN DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.BankAccount ELSE UNDEFINED END

SELECT DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.Ref, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.Date, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.DeletionMark, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.Number, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.Posted, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.Entity, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.CashType, CASE WHEN DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.CashType = VALUE(Enum.CashAssetTypes.Cash) THEN DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.PettyCash ELSE UNDEFINED END AS PettyCash, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.Article, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.Counterparty, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.AmountReceipt, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.AmountExpense, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.Currency, CAST(DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.Comment AS STRING(255)) AS Comment, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.Author, CASE WHEN DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.CashType = VALUE(Enum.CashAssetTypes.Noncash) THEN DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.BankAccount ELSE UNDEFINED END AS BankAccount, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.Type, SUM(AmountPerDay.AmountReceipt) AS AmountOfReceiptForDay, SUM(AmountPerDay.AmountExpense) AS ExpenseAmountPerDay FROM DocumentJournal.FundsPlanningDocuments AS DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar LEFT JOIN DocumentJournal.FundsPlanningDocuments AS AmountPerDay ON (BEGINOFPERIOD(DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.Date, Day) = BEGINOFPERIOD(AmountPerDay.Date, Day)) AND DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.Currency = AmountPerDay.Currency AND (AmountPerDay.Posted)
GROUP BY DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.Ref, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.Date, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.DeletionMark, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.Number, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.Posted, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.Entity, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.CashType, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.Article, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.Counterparty, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.AmountReceipt, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.AmountExpense, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.Currency, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.Author, DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.Type, CASE WHEN DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.CashType = VALUE(Enum.CashAssetTypes.Cash) THEN DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.PettyCash ELSE UNDEFINED END, CAST(DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.Comment AS STRING(255)), CASE WHEN DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.CashType = VALUE(Enum.CashAssetTypes.Noncash) THEN DocumentJournalPaymentCalendar.BankAccount ELSE UNDEFINED END
